thread.section_title: Avas Flowers Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Avas Flowers | avasflowers.com | 7 of 317
thread.title: Teresa Nelson
thread.title_full: Avas Flowers reviewed by Teresa Nelson

author: Teresa Nelson
title: Teresa Nelson
text:
The flowers I ordered were not delivered. Told the delivery driver didn't tell them if they delivered them. Local florist wouldn't answer their phone.
Avas Flowers wouldn't answer emails. Won't let you cancel order. Still charged full price minus express delivery for nothing.
I think that was the plan all along.
Customer service sounds like they are from a different country. You can't understand their accent.
